opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Smith v. Gillis, Superintendent, State Correctional Institution at Coal Township

opinion:
543 U.S. 802

SMITH
v.
GILLIS, SUPERINTENDENT, STATE CORRECTIONAL INSTITUTION AT COAL TOWNSHIP, ET AL.

No. 03-10280.

Supreme Court of United States.

October 4, 2004.

1

C.A. 3d Cir. Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied, and certiorari dismissed. See this Court's Rule 39.8.
